channel.title: Rune Strife new domain and we need testers
channel.description:
When beta is released you will be able to spawn and setlevel to test it and make sure its good. [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100114154134/runescape/images/5/5d/Strength_detail.PNG[/img]Plans for Rune Strife[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100114154134/runescape/images/5/5d/Strength_detail.PNG[/img] I hate seeing servers where to get 99s too easily. However, this isn't going to end up as challenging as RuneScape. We will have double xp weekends also. [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100406142356/runescape/images/6/63/Wc_symbol.PNG[/img] Developers[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100406142356/runescape/images/6/63/Wc_symbol.PNG[/img] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090920200721/runescape/images/8/80/Mining_Detail.PNG[/img]Progress[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090920200721/runescape/images/8/80/Mining_Detail.PNG[/img] Not Started, Started, Finished [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100116041411/runescape/images/4/4b/Herblore_detail.png[/img]Minigames[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100116041411/runescape/images/4/4b/Herblore_detail.png[/img] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080728140446/runescape/images/f/f0/Mg_barrows.jpg[/img] Barrows Finished

item.title: Rune Strife new domain and we need testers
item.dc:creator: @javamantle javamantle
item.description:
@javamantle wrote:

[font=Verdana][size=13px]Applying for : Staff/Server Coder C’mon can i plz code i want to code!
Real life name : Ali
Past Experience : I have playing rsps for a vary long time and I have had a server about 2 times Once Delta and once Pi I had about 10 players on at a time and about 25 ppl daily and[/size][/font]
[font=verdana, helvetica, sans-serif][/size][size=13px]A ton of character files that it takes a while to find mine
[/size][size=13px][/font]
[font=Verdana][/size][size=13px]Why do you want to work with us : I want to work with you guys because it looks like this server is going to be fun and enjoyable to everyone and i want players to join and Have FUN!
How long will you be online for : Weekends about all day week days about 4-6 hours a day.
[/size][/font]
Msn: Ali456hamadi@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: Rune Strife new domain and we need testers

item.title: Rune Strife new domain and we need testers
item.dc:creator: @Tea_Cup Tea Cup
item.description:
@Tea_Cup wrote:

Applying for: Moderator

Real life name: Greg

Past Experience: I have been playing RSPS for about 4-5 years, i was owner/co-owner on servers that i made with friends of mine, i have also been mods/admins on many other servers, i can’t remember the names of the servers because that was like a year a go but now i just help people code so it’s w/e

Why do you want to work with us: I want to work with use because your server looks like its going some where and you need good staff members to help make the server fun an enjoyable for everyone on the server, i feel like i can be a part of this community and help make it a fun place for players to come an hang out an talk.

How long will you be online for: I will be on for about 3-8 hours depending on the day or plans i have that day

Read full topic

[quote=“smkscape, post:23, topic:368240”]Applying for : GFX designer(More web - CSS & HTML)
Real life name : Vince H
Past Experience : Created lots of signatures/websites. I will make example website for Rune Srife right now(edit post when done).
Why do you want to work with us : I love designing and I have nothing special to do at this times.
How long will you be online for : I work from 7 AM till 4:30 PM. All other time I be online alot, except the weekends.

Contact:

MSN: pins@jvmwebclient.com
Email: vinceholstein@gmail.com[/quote]

welcome i have added your msn

item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

[quote=“Blademaster55, post:13, topic:368240”]Applying for : Forums Developer
Real life name : Colton M
Past Experience : Created various websites and worked as Forum Super Moderator for various forums. Various Forum Programs worked with, SMF, SMF Free, PHPBBFree, VBulletin, IPB Free, IPB, ProBoards
Why do you want to work with us : I am currently looking for something to do for my free time. I loved to create forums and websites. I saw this and thought it was very developed and looked like it had a promising future and wold love to help you become a well rounded project.
How long will you be online for : I can be online depending on my schedule. I am online most of the time when I am not at the firehall.[/quote]

do you have msn?

item.description:

[quote="#Haste, post:5, topic:368240"][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=464393.msg3396352#msg3396352 date=1289429850]
Am I seeing things or is that a new money model? And can I ask what’s going to be unique about this server?
[/quote]

Init, that money model and the rest of the item models. Are horrible[/quote]

i know i was testing something they are fine now

[quote=“Regiciide, post:3, topic:368240”] Applying for : GFX designer
Real life name : Alec
Past Experience : I’ve made Graphics for, jake jake scape, firescape, soulscape, project 69, end of days, tcnscape, MJK and alot more.
Why do you want to work with us : I just want a good staff spot easy and stuff not much responsibility except making graphics
How long will you be online for : weekdays with school, 6 and half hours, weekends, all day

[/quote]

welcome to the team

Added more on hfd

[quote=“neevbc, post:8, topic:368240”]-Applying for : Forums Developer / Staff

-Real life name : Neev

-Past Experience : I make forums for anyone who asks from me + I used to make my self some forums when I run in the past my RSPS! for proof speak to me
and about staff , Ive been owner 2 times on 30-40 players servers, 3 times moderator on 20-40 players server + Im still a Mod at some server (which i wont advertise so if you want ill show you)

-Why do you want to work with us : I love Making Websites and all that, I also love being in charge, knowing I have something to do! and I do it very well!

-How long will you be online for : 6-10 hours a day , ( yes i do have a life)[/quote]

could you pm me a link to one of your works?

Read full topic
